question: The headquarters of the "Pan African Chamber Of Commerce and Industry (PACCI)" is located in which city?
explanation: The headquarters of the Pan African Chamber Of Commerce and Industry (PACCI) is located in Addis Ababa, the capital city of Ethiopia. PACCI is a business support body which includes different chambers of commerce and private business of the countries in the African continent. It is an international nongovernmental organization established in 2010.
